root.name: Labyrinth Legends
root.description: OverviewLabyrinth Legends is a lighthearted fantasy themed dungeon crawler by Creat Studios. It sends the player into ancient tombs and mysterious tunnels to fight monsters, solve puzzles, and find gold, weapons and other treasures. The game supports local multiplayer with up to 4 players.Currently, only a PS3 version has been made, but a Vita version is under consideration.

similar_games.game: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
